data.title: University of North Carolina Athletics
data.meta_description: Andrew Lane joined the UNC Athletics ticket office staff in July of 2022. Lane most recently served as the Assistant Athletics Director of Ticketing at Elon ...
data.text:
Andrew Lane joined the UNC Athletics ticket office staff in July of 2022.

Lane most recently served as the Assistant Athletics Director of Ticketing at Elon University, where he oversaw all aspects of ticket sales and operations.

Prior to Elon, Lane was the Director of Ticketing and Annual Fundraising at Campbell University, overseeing all aspects of the ticket office and assisting with all annual fundraising efforts for the Fighting Camel Club. During his time at Campbell, Lane was an integral part of revenue generation, leading the team to an increase of 40 percent in overall ticket revenue.

During his time with the Houston Dynamo MLS franchise, Lane was a premium ticket sales and services executive focusing on selling all premium inventory for the Dynamo and Dash, including suites and club seating.

Before his time in Houston, Lane served as a senior corporate ticket sales executive for the North Carolina Football Club. In this role, he was responsible for season ticket and group ticket sales for North Carolina FC and the North Carolina Courage. Prior to his departure, he was one of the top three sales executives in Division 2 menâ€™s soccer.

Lane earned a B.A. in sports management from Campbell University and an M.S. in sports management from Western Carolina University.

Lane and his wife Jordie have two children, Joseph and Palmer
